languages.text: "Большинство местных занимается разгрузкой составов и сортировкой припасов. Тех, что поспособнее, мы распределяем на обслуживающие работы. Прочие же... служат трудовым запасом. Если на какой-то палубе случится убыль экипажа, из этих крыс наберут замену и увезут туда. Ежели где нужны лишние руки — опять же, охотников потрудиться за паек тут предостаточно, аж в очереди стоят".

"Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."
languages.original_text: "Большинство местных занимается разгрузкой составов и сортировкой припасов. Тех, что поспособнее, мы распределяем на обслуживающие работы. Прочие же... служат трудовым запасом. Если на какой-то палубе случится убыль экипажа, из этих крыс наберут замену и увезут туда. Ежели где нужны лишние руки — опять же, охотников потрудиться за паек тут предостаточно, аж в очереди стоят".

traits.locale_text: "Most of the locals do train unloading and provision sorting jobs. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever there's crew loss on a deck, we find replacements among those rats and take them there. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, more than enough are eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

"Most of the locals do train unloading and provision sorting jobs. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever there's crew loss on a deck, we find replacements among those rats and take them there. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, more than enough are eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

"Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

"Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

"Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

"Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

languages.text: «La mayoría de los habitantes descargan trenes y organizan provisiones. Dejamos los trabajos de mantenimiento a los más capacitados. El resto... son trabajadores de reserva. Cuando perdemos gente en una cubierta, buscamos reemplazos entre esas ratas. Y, si hacen falta más manos en alguna parte, siempre hay voluntarios de sobra para trabajar por raciones. Hasta hacen cola para ello».
languages.original_text: "Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

traits.locale_text: «La mayoría de los habitantes descargan trenes y organizan provisiones. Dejamos los trabajos de mantenimiento a los más capacitados. El resto... son trabajadores de reserva. Cuando perdemos gente en una cubierta, buscamos reemplazos entre esas ratas. Y, si hacen falta más manos en alguna parte, siempre hay voluntarios de sobra para trabajar por raciones. Hasta hacen cola para ello».

languages.text: 「現地人の大半は、列車のに卸や食料品の仕分けをしています。能力のある物にはメンテナンスの仕事を与えます。残りは…予備要員です。デッキで乗組員がいなくなった際に、そのネズミの中から代わりの者を見つけてくるのです。また、人手が必要な場所があれば、配給を求めて働こうとするボランティアは常に大勢いるのです。彼らは職を求めて行列すら作ります」
languages.original_text: "Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

traits.locale_text: 「現地人の大半は、列車のに卸や食料品の仕分けをしています。能力のある物にはメンテナンスの仕事を与えます。残りは…予備要員です。デッキで乗組員がいなくなった際に、そのネズミの中から代わりの者を見つけてくるのです。また、人手が必要な場所があれば、配給を求めて働こうとするボランティアは常に大勢いるのです。彼らは職を求めて行列すら作ります」

languages.text: “绝大多数工人都在忙着给列车卸货，整理食物。比较有能力的人会负责维护工作，至于其他人……都是后备劳力。只要甲板上有船员失踪，我们就会从这些底层人里面找人替代。若是其他地方需要人手，我们也总能找到足够多的劳动力。那些人愿意为了配给口粮干活，甚至会排队等活干。”
languages.original_text: "Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

traits.locale_text: “绝大多数工人都在忙着给列车卸货，整理食物。比较有能力的人会负责维护工作，至于其他人……都是后备劳力。只要甲板上有船员失踪，我们就会从这些底层人里面找人替代。若是其他地方需要人手，我们也总能找到足够多的劳动力。那些人愿意为了配给口粮干活，甚至会排队等活干。”

languages.text: "Die meisten Einheimischen entladen Züge und sortieren Vorräte. Den Fähigeren von ihnen geben wir Wartungsaufgaben. Der Rest sind ... Reservearbeitskräfte. Wenn auf einem Deck Crewmitglieder ausfallen, suchen wir Ersatz unter diesen Ratten. Und wenn an anderer Stelle zusätzliche Hände gebraucht werden, gibt es immer mehr als genug Freiwillige, die gerne für eine Ration arbeiten. Sie bilden sogar regelrechte Warteschlangen."
languages.original_text: "Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

traits.locale_text: "Die meisten Einheimischen entladen Züge und sortieren Vorräte. Den Fähigeren von ihnen geben wir Wartungsaufgaben. Der Rest sind ... Reservearbeitskräfte. Wenn auf einem Deck Crewmitglieder ausfallen, suchen wir Ersatz unter diesen Ratten. Und wenn an anderer Stelle zusätzliche Hände gebraucht werden, gibt es immer mehr als genug Freiwillige, die gerne für eine Ration arbeiten. Sie bilden sogar regelrechte Warteschlangen."

languages.text: « La plupart des habitants travaillent sur les quais, soit au déchargement des marchandises, soit au tri des provisions. Les plus compétents d'entre eux se voient parfois confier des travaux de maintenance. Quant aux autres... ils sont ce qu'on pourrait appeler des réservistes. C'est toujours pratique d'en avoir sous le coude quand on perd un membre d'équipe, ou quand on a besoin de main-d'œuvre supplémentaire quelque part. Croyez-moi si je vous dis qu'ils sont prêts à tout pour des rations. Ils font même la queue pour essayer de décrocher un emploi. »
languages.original_text: "Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."

C'est toujours pratique d'en avoir sous le coude quand on perd un membre d'équipe, ou quand on a besoin de main-d'œuvre supplémentaire quelque part. Croyez-moi si je vous dis qu'ils sont prêts à tout pour des rations. Ils font même la queue pour essayer de décrocher un emploi. »

languages.text: "Yerlilerin büyük kısmı, trenleri boşaltıp erzakları düzenliyor. Eli daha yatkın olanlara bakım işlerini veriyoruz. Gerisiyse... İş gücü rezervini oluşturuyor. Ne zaman ki mürettebat bir güvertede kaybolur, o sıçanlar arasından yenilerini getiririz. Bir yerde ilave iş gücü gerekirse de kumanya karşılığı çalışmaya hevesli haddinden fazla gönüllü çıkar. İş için sıraya bile girerler."
languages.original_text: "Most of the locals unload trains and sort provisions. We give maintenance jobs to the more capable ones. The rest... are reserve workforce. Whenever crew are lost on a deck, we find replacements from among those rats. And if extra hands are needed anywhere else, there are always more than enough volunteers eager to work for rations. They even queue for jobs."
